title: 'Jazbaa' packs in thrills, emotions and a nail-biting suspense
text:
Sanjay Gupta's upcoming thriller Jazbaa boasts of a stellar cast. While Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Irrfan are playing the lead roles, Shabana Azmi, Atul Kulkarni and Chandan Roy Sanyal will be seen playing pivotal characters as well. Here's a lowdown on the film's USP and what went into its making.
Trivia
Photography Jazbaa has been fabulously shot across different locations in Mumbai. Sameer Arya, the film's DOP, has beautifully captured the emerging skyline of the city like never before. Even the gritty locations in Mumbai have been shot aesthetically, making the film a treat to watch.

Dialogues
In Irrfan's words, the film's 'dhamakedaar seetimaar dialogues' are bound to entertain the audience. It was one of the prime reasons that attracted the actor towards the project.
Filmmaker Sanjay Gupta briefs Shabana Azmi and Aishwarya about their scene
Aishwarya's prep-work
Aishwarya did a lot of preparation to portray a lawyer in the film. She met lawyers and even went through various court case clippings to get the nuances of her character right. However, everything was not rehearsed. During a particular scene with dogs, where she was scared, her natural expressions were captured to add to the scene's authenticity.

Irrfan's perseverance
Irrfan especially flew down from Lithuania for two days just to dub for the film so that it stayed on track for release. During a scene with Aishwarya, Irrfan, even after delivering a perfect take, requested Sanjay to do few more takes as he wanted to provide variation in the performance. At the end, the director was left spoilt for choices as all the takes were brilliant.

Special Effects
There are around 800 VFX shots in the action thriller.
Aishwarya and Irrfan review their scene with Sanjay
PRODUCERS' TAKE ON THE FILM
Nittin Keni, CEO, Zee Studios
A unified effort, what symbolises this film is the professionalism of its star cast. It is extremely difficult to maintain the balance between a hard day's shoot and take care of a young child at the same time, the way Aishwarya did; or Irrfan's generous gesture of flying down all the way from Lithuania to dub for the film. We are confident that this sheer hard work and positive team spirit will transpire on celluloid. We are delighted to bring Jazbaa to the audiences of over 40 countries simultaneously.
Akash Chawla, Business Head, Zee Studios
Every individual worked relentlessly to achieve the best in Jazbaa . It's an edgy thriller, which has been beautifully shot across the city of Mumbai. It will leave viewers spellbound.
Sachiin Joshi, Vice Chairman, Viiking Media and Entertainment
It's been an exhilarating and great journey being associated with Jazbaa . Fans and audiences would be in for a treat with powerhouse talents like Shabana Azmi, Atul Kulkarni, Irrfan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, not to forget the music and Sanjay Gupta's direction.
Sanjay Gupta, White Feather Films
Shooting Jazbaa was like fighting a battle every day as we wrapped up the whole film in 51 days. Sameer, the DOP, literally went to locations at 5 am to get it ready to film by 9 am. We had no luxury of taking it easy or relaxing in the vanity van. It was a hands-on job. Jazbaa . produced by Zee Studios, Viiking Media and Entertainment and White Feather Films, releases worldwide on October 9.
